name: Jenkins Plugin Development
description: Configures Maven for Jenkins plugin development with proper repository settings and incremental build support

enableIncrementalBuild.description: Enable Jenkins incrementals repository for testing unreleased versions

mavenVersion.description: Maven version to ensure is installed (if not already present)

additionalProfiles.description: Comma-separated list of additional Maven profiles to activate by default

mirrorId.description: Maven mirror ID for Jenkins repository

installLocation.description: Where to install settings.xml: user (~/.m2), system (/etc/maven), or both

enableOfflineMode.description: Configure Maven for offline mode (useful for air-gapped environments)
